then join helper will acquiescently start in it 
pls click to APP permission to find me and open the "Pop-ups" 
and keep the soft run in the background Apply expand status bar
 then DuelAssiatant will work normally Apply Display over other APPs
 then DuelAssiatant will work normally about Quick Join in Game To Open Pop-ups MENU QQ Group join QQ group to report problems your donation will be used for keeping severs updating, buying card to get artworks and purchasing new phone to adapt click covers and select files click background and select files click avatar and select files click link arrows Already be the Lastest Version the permission %s is denied. it will hide virtual-key Download Now Downloading Found New Version OK Cancel Now Checking Update New upGrade is Founded, Download? Checking Update Failed Download pre-cards failed Mycard Super-pre Server trying other way... DuelAssiatant is On Master Rule Soft Tutorial Click button which you want to know to Open YGOMobile Crashed！ Invalid Shortcut Return to Duel☞ DuelAssistant Copy PSW to Quick Join Game. 
Copy Deck Text to Save as YDK and Open in Deck Editor Find your copyed Deck Text, Save or Not? save failed bcos of Deck Text copyed Save and Open Results Prepare to Share Pack AI Decks Uncategorized Online Deck My Online Deck please input category name invalid category name please select target category will delete all deck of this Category no_deck_is_selected done\！ Do not change decks of this category Code Share Share Art File share unable to edit empty deck Create Failed Original Resolution Scale Display Already the first card Already the last card Redownload no Large image for pre-released data Current game has been Returned myFav★ expansion file installed To use it, We recommend you to check "Use Expansions" unless you have installed pre-card in another way Long-press name to delete file install failed, because\: BackUp Restore BackUp/Restore BackUp\: back up all decks to Sdcard/ygocore 
Restore\: restore backed up decks found backed up decks in your Device\, restore\?
Very necessary permissions will be applied\: 
Clipboard permission: Required for reading deck codes and match codes 
Storage Access\:backup/restore deck\,set custom background/avatars/cardback Menu\:
including most of functions, for Example Mycard\: rank duel record, observe games, chating room, etc. Server list\: click a server to join online Game Server edit\: edit server information. for example\: change nickname Help\: specifically guide How to use YGOMobile and learn Master Rules Settings\: turn on Expansions and DuelAssistant.set game avatars, background, cardback. click to reset when pictures or any files are mistaken deleted Inputted password will be recorded. Lone-Press to delete record(s) you can join game without password to start random duel with default mode 
 use specified password and share other players to join same game 
 more duel model password you can see the tortuial. click search buttton to edit search criteria here shows search result count click to see search result
 also here will shows favorite cards click to change Decks
 you can manage deck categories here press a card to move it to other place
long-press this card to delete it Mycard News, you can click to see\only in Chinese now, Sorry delete expansions if you need to delete all expansion cards file loaded Click OK to confirm the deletion TCG OCG All Custom No exclusive SChinese OCG Reserved height of curved screen Load database error download
expansions Watch replay Bot game My login Logout mycard\? back to homepage Input your message Chatroom logined relogining\.\.\. the room password has been recorded in record list.
pls close ygopro and rejoin room through the record of room password Please upgrade pre-released cards at once fastest upgrade. download expansions New cards available! Save Failed!
